description:
Welcome to my Oasis in East Village. The apartment is located in the only dead end I know in NYC thus it's very quiet. With 4 windows facing South you will have tons of sunlight in the morning and during the day. This studio is for up to 4 people and I promise that everyone will sleep comfortably, as the daybed is easy convertible into a full size bed (actual full size mattress) and my loft bed above the kitchen. I love it and you will love it too. Very close to supermarkets and other cool spots

Lots of daylight and super quiet. A real escape in the city.

East Village is the neighborhood with lots of great and diverse restaurants and bars for the real New York experience.
name: Green Oasis in East Village
review: The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
